001package edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import android.util.Log;
005import android.view.LayoutInflater;
006import android.view.Menu;
007import android.view.View;
008import android.view.ViewGroup;
009import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
010import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
011import androidx.appcompat.widget.PopupMenu;
012import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
013import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
014import androidx.navigation.Navigation;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.R;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.adapter.PassphrasesAdapter;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.databinding.FragmentPassphrasesBinding;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.model.Passphrase;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.viewmodel.PassphraseViewModel;
020
021public class PassphrasesFragment extends Fragment {
022
023  private FragmentPassphrasesBinding binding;
024  private PassphraseViewModel viewModel;
025
026  @Nullable
027  @Override
028  public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container,
029      @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
030    binding = FragmentPassphrasesBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
031    binding.refresh.setOnClickListener((v) -> viewModel.fetch());
032    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
033    binding.search.setOnClickListener((v) ->
034        viewModel.search(binding.searchText.getText().toString()));
035    binding.create.setOnClickListener((v) -> openDialog(null));
036    // TODO: 11/2/23 Attach listeners.
037    return binding.getRoot();
038  }
039
040  @Override
041  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
042    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
043    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity())
044        .get(PassphraseViewModel.class);
045    getLifecycle().addObserver(viewModel);
046    viewModel
047        .getPassphrases()
048        .observe(
049            getViewLifecycleOwner(),
050            (passphrases) ->
051                binding.passphrases.setAdapter(
052                    new PassphrasesAdapter(
053                        requireContext(),
054                        passphrases,
055                        (v, pos, passphrase) -> openDialog(passphrase.getKey()),
056                        (v, pos, passphrase) -> showPopUpMenu(v, passphrase)
057                    )
058                )
059        );
060  }
061
062  private void openDialog(String key) {
063    Navigation.findNavController(binding.getRoot())
064        .navigate(PassphrasesFragmentDirections.openEditPassphraseFragment().setKey(key));
065  }
066
067  private void showPopUpMenu(View view, Passphrase passphrase) {
068    PopupMenu popup = new PopupMenu(requireContext(), view);
069    Menu menu = popup.getMenu();
070    popup.getMenuInflater().inflate(R.menu.passphrase_actions, menu);
071    menu.findItem(R.id.edit_passphrase).setOnMenuItemClickListener((item) -> {
072      openDialog(passphrase.getKey());
073      return true;
074    });
075    menu.findItem(R.id.delete_passphrase).setOnMenuItemClickListener((item) -> {
076      // TODO: 11/7/23 Ask for user confirmation.
077      viewModel.delete(passphrase.getKey());
078      // TODO: 11/7/23 Modify PassphraseViewModel to refresh automatically after successful creation, update, or deletion.
079      return true;
080    });
081    popup.show();
082  }
083}
